audioText: Cette décision a été prise après consultation de tous les propriétaires d'animaux du quartier.
question: When was this decision made?
options: After consulting all pet owners in the neighborhood
Before consulting all pet owners in the neighborhood
During a meeting with all pet owners in the neighborhood
Without consulting any pet owners in the neighborhood
explanation: The French sentence uses 'prise' - the past participle of 'prendre' (to take) in feminine form, agreeing with 'décision'. 'Cette décision a été prise' means 'this decision was taken/made'. It was made after consulting all pet owners.
